data.description: Three bedroom ranch home with 2500 square feet of living space, including the finished basement! A cozy fireplace and daylight-filled sitting room welcome you into the home. Moving further inside, you'll find a spacious, updated kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances & plenty of counter space for food prep. The kitchen is open to the dining area and living room at the back of the home, overlooking the tree-lined yard. You'll also find two updated bathrooms & 3 bedrooms on the main level. The basement features plenty of room to entertain as well as a bar area. Outdoors, the patio is surrounded by mature landscaping & a water feature offering a tranquil place to enjoy outdoor meals. Updates include flooring, appliances, kitchen, & paint. Don't miss this home; call for a tour today!
